trans-unit.source: Ways to make a temporary Wi-Fi Network
trans-unit.target: Các cách tạo ra WiFi Network tạm thời
Bắt đầu hotspot trên điện thoại

trans-unit.source: Many mobile phones have a feature called a 'hotspot' that creates a Wi-Fi network. First disconnect from the mobile network (so that there are no data charges). Next, enable the hotspot. Finally, set your laptop and other phones to join that network.
trans-unit.target: Many mobile phones have a feature called a 'hotspot' that creates a Wi-Fi network. First disconnect from the mobile network (so that there are no data charges). Next, enable the hotspot. Finally, set your laptop and other phones to join that network.

trans-unit.source: Start a network using your laptop
trans-unit.target: Bắt đầu network bằng laptop của bạn

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 laptops can also create local Wi-Fi networks. Do a web search for "windows netsh hostednetwork". If your laptop does not support this, you can get inexpensive USB Wi-Fi adaptors that do. When shopping, make sure the adaptor supports "hosted network".
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 laptops can also create local Wi-Fi networks. Do a web search for "windows netsh hostednetwork". If your laptop does not support this, you can get inexpensive USB Wi-Fi adaptors that do. When shopping, make sure the adaptor supports "hosted network".
